title: league is not working
body: i think it happened because my mum restored the computer to a week back, anyways when i click on LoL it comes up with the title like its loading, then just disappears and wont ever open to the launch page. ive uninstalled it and installed it to see if that works but it hasnt, what should i do?

replies.body:
Panic, scream as loud as you can and flail your arms around hopelessly as you sink into a dark pit of insurmountable despair.

lol jk

Have you tried running it in administrator mode?
